entry.title: [GRA][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Private Registry maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 19, 08:00 - 19:00 UTC

Jun 4, 20:30 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed Private Registry offer.

This may temporarily affect Functionality.

Start time : 19/08/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 19/08/2025 19:00 UTC
Service impact : Managed Private Registries will be set in read-only mode (only pull will be allowed) for less than 30 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will migrate some registries being on GRA region to a new infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX/SBG][Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Rancher Service upgrade notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 5, 08:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jun 12, 16:32 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Containers & Orchestration offer.

Start time : 05/08/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 05/08/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : Rancher version 2.8.7 end of support is reached since April 2025.
As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to force upgrade Ranchers to version 2.9.
The Rancher compatibility matrix with downstream clusters will be changed, as K8S version 1.25 & 1.26 will no longer be officially supported.
For more information regarding Managed Rancher Service supported versions and lifecycle policy, you can visit this page: KB0064608

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [DE1][Compute - Instance] - Instances incident notification

Here is detail for this incident :

Impacted Service(s) : Some instances in the region DE1 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their instances.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [Global][Compute - Instance] - Images EoL notification
entry.content:
Jul 4, 09:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 3, 13:29 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Virtual Private Servers offer.

Start time : 04/07/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 04/08/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : Below-mentioned images will no longer be available to purchase or use.

Several images currently offered as part of our VPS offering have reached, or are approaching, End of Life (EoL). As of August 4th, 2025, these images will be officially removed from our VPS catalog in accordance with our End of Life policy. You can read more about our distribution End of Life policy here : https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-vps-image-life-cycle?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0050801

Below is the complete list of images, as well our recommendations and alternatives for VPS environments.
EoL DistributionEoL / EoS dateAlternative DistributionRecommended action
Centos 730/06/2024AlmaLinux/ Rocky LinuxBackup and upgrade distribution
Debian 918/07/2020Debian 12Backup and upgrade distribution
Debian 1010/09/2022Debian 12Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3705/12/2023Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3821/05/2024Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 3926/11/2024Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
Fedora 4013/05/2025Fedora 42Backup and upgrade distribution
Ubuntu 20.0431/05/2025Ubuntu 25.04Backup and upgrade distribution
Ubuntu 20.0431/05/2025Ubuntu 25.04Backup and upgrade distribution
Ubuntu 21.0420/01/2022Ubuntu 25.04Backup and upgrade distribution
Ubuntu 21.0420/01/2022Ubuntu 25.04Backup and upgrade distribution
Ubuntu 23.0420/01/2024Ubuntu 25.04Backup and upgrade distribution
Ubuntu 24.1010/07/2025Ubuntu 25.04Backup and upgrade distribution

If you use automation to deploy your infrastructure with any of these images, we strongly recommend that you either switch to another distribution or upload your own image to use instead. You can refer to the following guides to :
Upgrade operating system: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upgrade-operating-system?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051306
Upload your image: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-gb-public-cloud-compute-upload-own-image?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0051319

Service improvement : As part of our End of Life policy, the above-mentioned images will no longer be available for purchase or reinstallation in our VPS offering.

For any question, please reach out to our support team.
Thank you for your understanding.
